p: The morphology of callus cultured on MS and WPM medium supplemented with auxins is shown in Figure 3. Compact callus was produced from callus grown on MSO ( Figure 3a) and WPMO ( Figure 3h). Friable callus was produced from MS + 50 µM IBA- ( Figure 3c), MS + 20 µM picloram- ( Figure 3f), and MS + 30 µM dicamba-treated callus ( Figure 3g). Meanwhile, MS + 40 µM NAA- ( Figure 3b), MS + 20 µM IAA- ( Figure 3d), and MS + 30 µM 2,4-D-treated callus ( Figure 3e) produced mixed callus (friable and compact callus). The production of mixed callus was also observed from callus grown on WPM + auxins ( Figure 3 i–n).
